titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow dyed diesel to be sold in rural areas for use in highway vehicles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/29/2008--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the excise tax on diesel fuel and special motor fuels sales of such fuels in a rural area to any operator of a diesel-powered highway vehicle with a gross vehicle weight of less than 25,000 pounds.
